00019      *  Main component is instance of the <code>JPWorld</code>.

00025      */
00026     @Override
00027     public void init () 
00028     {
00029         super.init ();
00030         
00031         setSize( 1024, 600 );
00032         getContentPane ().add( wopComponent, BorderLayout.CENTER );

00034
